objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#F5F5F5'/><rect x='0' y='0' width='540' height='540' fill='#E8E8E8'/><rect x='540' y='0' width='540' height='540' fill='#D6D6D6'/><rect x='0' y='540' width='540' height='540' fill='#BEBEBE'/><rect x='540' y='540' width='540' height='540' fill='#D9D9D9'/><g opacity='0.3'><path d='M0,0 L1080,1080' stroke='#9E9E9E' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M1080,0 L0,1080' stroke='#9E9E9E' stroke-width='1'/></g><circle cx='270' cy='270' r='200' fill='#D0D0D0' opacity='0.4'/><circle cx='810' cy='810' r='200' fill='#C0C0C0' opacity='0.4'/><g transform='translate(750, 150)'><circle cx='0' cy='0' r='5' fill='#808080'/><circle cx='20' cy='0' r='5' fill='#808080'/><circle cx='40' cy='0' r='5' fill='#808080'/><circle cx='60' cy='0' r='5' fill='#808080'/><circle cx='80' cy='0' r='5' fill='#808080'/></g><g transform='translate(150, 750)'><circle cx='0' cy='0' r='5' fill='#808080'/><circle cx='20' cy='0' r='5' fill='#808080'/><circle cx='40' cy='0' r='5' fill='#808080'/><circle cx='60' cy='0' r='5' fill='#808080'/><circle cx='80' cy='0' r='5' fill='#808080'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
• Complete Apple ecosystem solution
• Seamless integration across devices
• Latest iOS and macOS pre-installed
• Includes all power adapters & cables

product_details.name: Apple Premium Device Bundle - MacBook Pro + iPad + iPhone Package
product_details.description:
• Complete Apple ecosystem solution for seamless integration across devices
• MacBook Pro featuring Retina display and backlit keyboard
• Large trackpad with Multi-Touch gesture support
• iPad with high-resolution display, perfect for productivity and entertainment
• iPhone with advanced camera system and Touch ID
• All devices in pristine silver/white finish
• Latest iOS and macOS operating systems pre-installed
• Seamless iCloud synchronization across all devices
• Perfect for professionals, creatives, and Apple enthusiasts
• Includes power adapters and charging cables
• Instant ecosystem setup with Apple ID
• Ideal for work, entertainment, and staying connected on any device

banner_details:
This banner showcases a high-end promotional design for a premium technology product bundle. It consists of a balanced dual-tone background split into light grey and cool stone-grey quadrants with circular accent elements. The top-left portion prominently features a modern, geometric-styled heading (`heading`) followed by a bold subheading (`subheading`) that emphasizes the exclusive bundle offer. Just beneath, a compact tagline (`tagline`) highlights the devices included. The visually structured feature list (`description`) delivers clear product benefits with bullet points. The pricing detail (`price`) is emphasized in bold, modern typography. A dark rectangular call-to-action (`cta_background`) with contrasting white text (`cta`) sits at the bottom-left. To the right, a clean product image (`product_image`) of a laptop, tablet, and smartphone enhances product perception with slight shadow and realistic contrast.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Gray: `#F5F5F5`
- Soft Gray: `#E8E8E8`
- Medium Gray: `#D6D6D6`
- Steel Gray: `#BEBEBE`
- Shadow Gray: `#D9D9D9`
- Accent Circle Gray: `#D0D0D0`, `#C0C0C0`
- Dark Text Gray: `#333333`
- Subtext Gray: `#555555`
- Bullet Point Gray: `#808080`
- CTA Text: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases Apple devices with a premium, minimalist aesthetic. The colors blend technological elegance with natural serenity. Dominant tones include sleek silver-grey (#B0B0B0) for the hardware, deep black (#1E1E1E) in the keyboard and screen bezels, and vibrant screen visuals. The MacBook display features a sunset-inspired palette of dusty pink (#D89DA2), soft lavender (#B8A6C9), and warm gold (#E1B97C), harmonizing with earthy browns (#6B4F3E). The iPad and iPhone screens show a cool cosmic blue (#2F4F6D) and icy white (#F4F4F4). The overall blending achieves clarity and depth, with light-to-dark contrasts that highlight the devices’ sleek design while drawing attention to the vibrant displays.
